Title: Honeywell Home T3R Y3H710RF0053 t3r wireless 5+2 day thermostat+stand
Description: Suitable for use in domestic heating systems, the T3R wireless 5+2 day programmable thermostat is particularly recommended for social housing, new build properties and for mass installation jobs. It is compatible with a variety of boilers and systems, including 24 to 230V on/off units such as gas and oil boilers, combi-boilers and heat pumps, however it cannot be used for operation of electric boilers. Easy to operate, the T3R provides OpenTherm control for reliable time and temperature switching. A stand is supplied with this unit for ease of storage.
